0.cdata!:
Tunisie - Amenagement urbain et
            transports en commun

abstracts.cdata!:
The Tunis District Urban Planning and
            Public Transport Project for Tunisia consists of: (a)
            consultant services to the Tunis District, to aid it in
            carrying out its planning, programming and supervision
            functions and in training its personnel; (b) purchase of up
            to 210 buses, including an initial stock of spare parts, to
            renew SNT's (Societe Nationale des Transports) urban
            bus fleet and help meet its needs for new vehicles; (c)
            purchase of 26 electric railway cars, signaling equipment
            and other materials required to renew the TGM  (Tunis - La
            Goulette - La Marsa Railway) railway line of SNT; (d)
            construction of a new bus maintenance depot for SNT; (e)
            improvement of key traffic intersections and purchase and
            installation of related signaling equipment for the
            Municipality of Tunis; (f) consultant services for technical
            assistance, to the Government, SNT and the Municipality of Tunis.
